Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClient, Serializable, Remote
public class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IClient
The Client class represents a client application for interacting with the Googol Search Engine Gateway.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      Client() throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new Client object and connects it to the Gateway via rmi.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an RMI-related error.

  • Method Details

    • connectToGateway

      private void connectToGateway()
      Connects to the RMI gateway by looking up the server's remote object. If connection fails, it handles the error and exits the program.

    • handleErrorAndExit

      private void handleErrorAndExit(String message)
      Handles errors and exits the program.
      Parameters:
      message - the error message to display.

    • printOnClient

      public void printOnClient(String s) throws RemoteException
      Prints messages received from the server on the client console. If the message is a shutdown signal, it exits the program.
      Specified by:
      printOnClient in interface IClient
      Parameters:
      s - the message received from the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an RMI-related error.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the client application by displaying the menu and handling user input. If the user chooses to exit, it unsubscribes from the server and disconnects from the RMI Registry.

    • printMenu

      private void printMenu()
      Prints the main menu options.

    • indexURL

      private void indexURL(Scanner sc, IGatewayCli gw)
      Indexes a URL by sending it to the gateway for processing.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner object for user input.
      gw - the remote gateway object.

    • search

      private void search(Scanner sc)
      Searches for a query by calling the remote gateway method and displays the results.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner object for user input.

    • displayResults

      private void displayResults(String result, Scanner sc)
      Displays the search results in pages of 10 results each.
      Parameters:
      result - the search results to display.
      sc - the Scanner object for user input.

    • findSubLinks

      private void findSubLinks(Scanner sc)
      Finds sub-links for a given URL and displays the results.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner object for user input.

    • displaySubLinks

      sc - the Scanner object for user input.

      private void printAdminMenu()
